channel.title: Password? Help
channel.description:
I started & ran my source this morning and had a few players on. It is an Allstar. After a while they left and others started coming, so I was checking their passwords and one guy had this
[code][ACCOUNT] character-username = flang character-password = 734161c3145a5cf47da28979d9ff2244e8e1b663
[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 2857[/code]
The password of flang is like encrypted, but my server does not encrypt passwords.. In dereick0's account it is normal, how come one is encrypted and one is not? & He logged on multiple times, so he couldn't have just remembered that long password or written it for a once time use.
[code][ACCOUNT] character-username = dereick0 character-password = four4
[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3024[/code]

item.title: Password? Help
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Looking at your players’ passwords seems a bit fishy. Your question has been answered above though.

Read full topic

item.title: Password? Help
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

AtomicInt_:

Possibly the account was from a previous time when the server encrypted the passwords.

Read full topic

item.title: Password? Help
item.dc:creator: @Reamm28 Reamm28
item.description:
@Reamm28 wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:3, topic:444799”]Possibly the account was from a previous time when the server encrypted the passwords.

Why do you even need to look at their passwords anyways? They’re encrypted for a reason.[/quote]

The logs say he possibly has duped items, which he did.

Read full topic

item.title: Password? Help
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Possibly the account was from a previous time when the server encrypted the passwords.

Why do you even need to look at their passwords anyways? They’re encrypted for a reason.

Read full topic

item.title: Password? Help
item.dc:creator: @i_am_infamy i am infamy
item.description:
@i_am_infamy wrote:

Maybe your server might have some sort of coding that encrypt’s passwords after a certain amount of login’s im not sure but thats my guess

Read full topic

item.title: Password? Help
item.dc:creator: @Reamm28 Reamm28
item.description:
@Reamm28 wrote:

I started & ran my source this morning and had a few players on. It is an Allstar.
After a while they left and others started coming, so I was checking their passwords and one guy had this

[code][ACCOUNT]
character-username = flang
character-password = 734161c3145a5cf47da28979d9ff2244e8e1b663

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 2857[/code]

The password of flang is like encrypted, but my server does not encrypt passwords… In dereick0’s account it is normal, how come one is encrypted and one is not? & He logged on multiple times, so he couldn’t have just remembered that long password or written it for a once time use.

[code][ACCOUNT]
character-username = dereick0
character-password = four4

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3024[/code]

Read full topic
